Developer Terms of Use
des: The Center for World Networking has been hosting channelings of Sri Yukteswar since the early 1980s. This radio stream is a random collection of many years of channelings. Please listen and enjoy the wisdom. Please note: In the guru's way, there may be long sections of silence between the initial "Namaste" and the satsung message.
priv:
